description:
Zack has returned to his studies abroad. Because I knew we wouldn't be seeing him for a while, I wanted to send him out with a bang. So I rounded up some of my favorite guys (Adam, Trevor, Damon, Tyler, and Brad) for a big 'ole orgy.
I've been itching to do a bukkake ending for a while now. You know, that's where a willing recipient receives a cum bath from a bunch of hot studs. Tyler was the lucky guy here and by the smile on his face at the end it was obvious he enjoyed it.
title: Bukkake Orgy
